channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Will Wade on Darrion Williams Criticism: 'Everybody Needs to Shut the Hell Up'
item.description: NC State coach Will Wade vented his frustrations with media criticism of the play of transfer Darrion Williams.

item.title: Rose Bowl Live Updates, Score: No. 9 Alabama vs. No. 1 Indiana
item.description: The 2025 CFP continues with the highly anticipated Rose Bowl matchup between No. 1 Indiana and No. 9 Alabama.

item.title: 2025 CFP Odds: Lines, Spreads for Each Quarterfinal Game
item.description: Check out the odds for the College Football Playoff quarterfinal games.

item.title: NFL Confidential: Will Lamar Actually Get Traded? Execs Dish on Jackson, Crosby
item.description: One league executive doesn't think Lamar Jackson will get traded, but another knows who might be a strong fit for the QB.

item.title: 2025 CFP Title Odds: Miami Skyrockets After Win Over OSU; Ducks Rise
item.description: See the latest CFP title odds, now that the defending champion Buckeyes have been bounced.

item.title: Will Ole Miss be the latest team to get revenge in a CFP rematch?
item.description: The Sugar Bowl showdown will mark the fifth time in the playoff era that two teams will meet in the CFP.

item.title: 16 teams in the NFL playoff mix, 16 potential downfalls: Let's find each roster's fatal flaw
item.description: We found fatal flaws for all 12 clinched teams in the playoff field, plus the AFC North and NFC South teams trying to join them entering Week 18.

item.title: NFL playoff schedule, projected bracket: Here's what to know in both conferences
item.description: The playoffs begin on Jan. 10 with three full rounds before Super Bowl LX on Feb. 8.

item.title: How speedster Zachariah Branch made a fast impression at Georgia
item.description: After transferring from USC, the elusive receiver has become the Bulldogs' most dangerous weapon.

item.title: Ducks' defense blanks Tech to reach CFP semis
item.description: Matayo Uiagalelei caused a fumble to set up a touchdown as the Ducks silenced Texas Tech 23-0 in the Orange Bowl to reach the College Football Playoff...
